data.title: School of Chemistry & Biochemistry
data.text:
The faculty of the School of Chemistry and Biochemistry have received recognition through the award of local, national, and international awards presented by professional associations, foundations, and academic institutions.

Faculty honors and awards include:

A National Medal of Science winner

A member of the National Academy of Science

Two members of the National Academy of Engineering (adjunct)

Eleven Alfred P. Sloan Fellows

Eight fellows of the Camille and Henry Dreyfus Foundation

Eighteen NSF CAREER awardees

Eight fellows of the American Chemical Society

Nine fellows of the American Physical Society

Two Beckman Foundation Awardees

Two PECASE Awardees

Two Research Corporation Cottrell Fellows

Seventeen Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science
